ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Oh this can't be good....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, that s a real problem then.  On the recently-wiped Gameplay board, there are 10 separate posts with the words chain or snare in the titles which
ygData.messageBody:
Adam Wasserman wrote:
>
> Kit,
>
> I haven't been under a rock. (although it may have been safer there, maybe I
> should try it) I've seen and contributed to many of the posts. But when I
> read Abashi's reply, I honestly believe he has absolutely no idea what we
> are talking about when we reference the problems with chains and lullaby.

Well, that's a real problem then. On the recently-wiped Gameplay board, there are 10
separate posts with the words "chain" or "snare" in the titles which discuss the nerf to
the level 23 song, and 13 separate posts with the words "lullaby" or "mez" in the title
which discuss the problem with Lullaby and Pixie Strike. This doesn't mention all the
other threads that discuss these topics that do not have the words in the title.

HOW COULD HE NOT KNOW? Isn't it his JOB to know? Isn't he supposed to read at LEAST the
first post in a new thread? Or does he just notice the word "bard" in the title and blow
it off? I work a full-time job, and I STILL know what most of the major issues are that
are bothering other players of ALL types, not just bards. Two months ago he tells us that
Chains should not have been nerfed, and now he has no idea what we're talking about? He
thinks that maybe someone somewhere mentioned in passing that Lullaby is just fine, so that
makes it OK? I'm apoplectic.

It's like talking to a freaking rock.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 52 songs, Innoruuk
